title: Himi 275
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e ‘Otua mo’oni
‘A e Laumālie,
Pea ‘oku kau mo Sīsū,
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
2.
Ko e Laumālie Lelei,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
‘Oku ngāue mālohi mai,
Ki he kakai hia.
3.
’Oku ne takitala’i,
‘A e loto maka!
Pea toki mafōfoa,
Pea manavahē.
4.
Pea fakatomala ai,
‘A e angakovi;
Pea fakaangavaivai,
Pea loto liliu.
5.
Pea ‘oku tokoni mai,
‘E ho Laumālie
‘A e kakai angavaivai,
‘I he’enau lotu.
6.
Pea ‘oku ne tataki,
‘A e kakai kumi!
Ki hotau Fakaamo’ui
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi. *
